page.title: 02 STUBLEY HOLLOW
page.content: The main land cover of the Stubley Hollow area of Dronfield was grass. The second main land cover was houses. The third land cover was factories. A lot of the factories were closed down. The houses were brick,stone or brick and stone. Most of them were semi detached. There was a small farm and also a football club ground. We saw a petrol station three bus stops,a letter box and a telephone box. We saw a specialist canoe factory whitch was still open. We saw a few offices. There was also a gas sub station.
